Articles.Content:
i am deaf, i am newbie still learn use with it

i wonder to know mine version is 0.90

i find there mods i want fix into mine but they version is 0.24

will working or must only 0.90 mods ?

and any tool need add for mods or just put into folder ?

please explain easy english and thank you

Some mods do not need updates for 0.90. Usually, modded parts will work, but plugins (.dll) will not work.

There is a new tool to help add mods: [thread=100067]Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network[/thread].

Most mods have a GameData folder. Put everything from there into your KSP\GameData\ folder.

Some mods do not have a GameData folder. Put the whole folder in KSP\GameData\.
